name: Champbot-2015
tagline: A Champ-like ROV, with brief submersion capability, designed to meet the demands of the Champlain Mini Maker Faire's ChampBot Challenge  of 2015
body:
Looking part Tanystropheus, part Gungan and sporting a wicked pair of drive-units on a pivoting boom, this bot is nearing completion.

The head is made of a license plate and the eyes are made of ping-pong balls lit by red LEDs.

# Specifications:
* Planned Launch September 12,2015 in Milton
* Type: Competition ChampBot ROV

## Key Features
 * Dual Hull, connected by 4 stanchions
 * Dual Drive Units
 * Piruett turning
 * Pivoting drive boom (propulsion/dive-plane selection)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
